Pre-Game Insights: Malawi National Football Team Coach Patrick Mabedi says the Flames will hope to redeem their pride when they host Senegal in the 2025 TotalErnegies Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) qualifiers at Bingu National Stadium on Tuesday.
Others: The Flames need a miracle to qualify for next yearâ€™s Afcon finals to be staged in Morocco.
Group L leaders Burkina Faso have already booked a spot at the Afcon finals following back-to-back victories over Burundi.
Malawi are bottom of the group without a point while Burundi is third with three points from four matches.
Goalkeeper Brighton Munthali is suspended for the match against Senegal after he received a red card in the first leg.
Senegal interim Coach Pape Thiaw said they expect a tough match against the Flames.
